channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Disabling localized satellite assemblies during dotnet publish
item.description: In this post I show how to reduce the size of the publish output for .NET apps by preventing the publishing of localization resources when they're not needed Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/disabling-localized-satellite-assemblies-during-dotnet-publish/
